title: FL Studio Open Type Feature Problem: Syntax Error
author: Jui

comments.content:
Try restarting Fontlab. If that doesn’t work, see if you can compile the OT code in Free Font Pro, if not, your Fontlab install might be corrupt.

And just in case you aren’t just using it as a test, AE is a letter, not a ligature, and shouldn’t have ligature code.

Hi!

Now it works! I don't know exactly why. I thought I did a restart yesterday and it doesn't worked.

Thanks for your help, anyway!

(YEEESSS, I know AE is not a ligature : ) It was just a quick test with the few glyphs I have so far)

Best,  
Juergen
